author: USA TODAY, Adrianna Rodriguez, Amanda Morris, Jim Sergent, Nicole Schaub and Janet Loehrke, USA TODAY
title: The tests that could reopen the country: How they work
description: Antibody testing will help health experts better assess how many people contracted the novel coronavirus.
content:
After weeks of sheltering in place, Americans are asking how soon we can return to a more normal life outside our homes. Much of the answer might be in a test. 
The first phase of testing has been about determining who has COVID-19. The next phase will be ab… [+5530 chars]
